3a47f86e-d6c6-44eb-b6f8-accc689b0b0c.title: Ban Kuon
3a47f86e-d6c6-44eb-b6f8-accc689b0b0c.itemDescription: Steam-cooked rice pancakes with ground pork. Served with soy sprouts, cucumber straws, Vietnamese herbs and cilantro (200 g).

6bcbcf45-235f-40b9-b261-db0a2b1acf6e.title: Noodle & Meat Salad
6bcbcf45-235f-40b9-b261-db0a2b1acf6e.itemDescription: This salad is a combination of rice noodles with spicy veal, carrots, cucumber, soy sprouts, and Vietnamese greens. Served with a sauce (270 g).

dd2fb410-f6e6-41cd-b900-8ce60f66d8ab.title: Noodle & Sweet Chicken
dd2fb410-f6e6-41cd-b900-8ce60f66d8ab.itemDescription: Salad with rice noodles, sweet chicken, seasonal vegetables, and Vietnamese herbs. Served with a sauce (270 g).

61ca1b5c-3007-424d-8342-8e6575ce29fa.title: Noodle & Tofu
61ca1b5c-3007-424d-8342-8e6575ce29fa.itemDescription: Rice noodles with tofu in oyster sauce with muer and shiitake mushrooms, three kinds of sweet pepper, celery, and leek. Delicious with soy sauce (300 g).

9065c8da-1498-4101-92a9-0865e5eb7098.title: Tofu Spring Rolls
9065c8da-1498-4101-92a9-0865e5eb7098.itemDescription: Homemade tofu, cucumber, carrot straws, roasted peanuts, Vietnamese greens and mint in rice paper. Served with a sauce (160 g).

d18f54d8-feae-4226-af18-c7cd5bcfd1ab.title: Noodles with Chicken
d18f54d8-feae-4226-af18-c7cd5bcfd1ab.itemDescription: Rice noodles with chicken in oyster sauce with muer and shiitake mushrooms, three kinds of sweet pepper, celery, and leek. Delicious with spicy sauce (300 g).

51dd0e17-6904-43e9-87c9-207aadb5024e.title: Pho Ga
51dd0e17-6904-43e9-87c9-207aadb5024e.itemDescription: Rich meat broth, served with rice noodles, chicken fillet, soy sprouts, cilantro, chili pepper, and a slice of lemon (700 ml).

48d946b7-d1e4-441f-a6d2-562b6c90cb2c.title: Bun Chay
48d946b7-d1e4-441f-a6d2-562b6c90cb2c.itemDescription: Rich vegetable and mushroom broth with ginger and rice noodles with cane sugar, muer mushrooms, tofu, cilantro, and pineapple pieces (700 ml).

d25edf5b-a6c7-438b-bb4d-08e872d6439c.title: Banh Bao
d25edf5b-a6c7-438b-bb4d-08e872d6439c.itemDescription: Steam-cooked bun with ground pork inside, quail egg, carrots, muer and shiitake mushrooms, cellophane noodles. Served warm (180 g).

5ebc3061-90ca-4c9f-a79a-047e2336309c.title: Nem Lem
5ebc3061-90ca-4c9f-a79a-047e2336309c.itemDescription: Steam-cooked rice pancakes with ground pork. Served with soy sprouts, cucumber straws, Vietnamese herbs and cilantro (150 g).

b138cd54-220e-4951-9361-0cf265516706.title: Fried Chicken Nems
b138cd54-220e-4951-9361-0cf265516706.itemDescription: Pancakes in rice paper, ground chicken thigh inside, shiitake mushrooms, cellophane noodles, carrots. Deep-fried. Served with a sauce (150 g).

5881e158-ce14-49d3-9911-cd28eb0b2e08.title: Pho Bo
5881e158-ce14-49d3-9911-cd28eb0b2e08.itemDescription: Rich meat broth, served with rice noodles, beef, soy sprouts, cilantro, chili pepper, and a slice of lemon. (700 ml).
